content.question: Suppose the country of Deetopia produces <math alttext="6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> cups of coffee and <math alttext="12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> donuts. Which of the following must be true?

choices.label: The combination leaves some resources unemployed.
The combination has the highest opportunity cost in production.
The combination is neither productively nor socially efficient.
The combination cannot be produced with the given amount of resources.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
